adevlibs.net.postmachine.defaulthttpclientpost

Class HttpClientPostMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • adevlibs.net.postmachine.defaulthttpclientpost.HttpClientPostMachine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPostMachine

    public class HttpClientPostMachine
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPostMachine
    IPostMachine的一个具体实现，主要作用是通过DefaultHttpClient以POST的方式向Server发送数据,
